What are the treatments for Developmental Dyspraxia ?,"Treatment is symptomatic and supportive and may include occupational and speech therapy, and ""cueing"" or other forms of communication such as using pictures and hand gestures. Many children with the disorder require special education.",NINDS,Developmental Dyspraxia
